page.title: 11A DUNSCROFT FAMILY DAY OUT
page.content: We set off at half past seven in the car and arrived in Scarborough at half past nine. We were caught in a traffic jam for ten minutes.We eventually parked on the sea front. Mum and I went shopping whilst my Dad and brother went fishing with the dog.We met up at one o'clock for our dinner.We ate ham sandwiches and coffee.Afterwards we climbed up to the castle,had a look around,climbed down again.It started to rain so we ran into the amusement arcades. Whilst it rained _(typical)_we played on the(Space Invaders game.) Later we drove home.At home we watched a film called(ALLIGATOR_not very frightening_)after which we went to bed!
